document_data.caption: A map showing Hammerstaad on Giantspine.
document_data.name: Hammerstaad
document_data.mainbody: '''Hammerstaad''' was a [[Northlander]] city on the island of [[Giantspine]] in [[Norheim]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The city was located on the southern end of the island on an unnamed natural bay just west of [[Northwind Strait]].
document_data.History: Hammerstaad was the seat of power for the king of Norheim. The city was protected by the nearby fortress where the king and his family lived.
